text: "Under My Thumb" is a song by The Rolling Stones. It is the fourth track from their 1966 studio album Aftermath. Although it was not released in the English-language countries. It has become one of the band's biggest hits of the 1960s and appears on their greatest hits albums such as Hot Rocks 1964-1971. It has been covered by Del Shannon, The Who and Tina Turner. ==References== Category:1966 songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:The Who songs Category:Tina Turner songs Category:Del Shannon songs
title: Under My Thumb
